item.title: Daily Morning Exercise Routines
item.description: Daily Bodyweight Fitness Routines Bottom Line Up Front Just starting is the hardest part, so start here. Do enough reps to feel the burn, then push through a few more. Legs Core Upper Squats Hollow Body Pushups Make your morning routing something like this: Get out of bed Drink whole glass of water Do morning exercise This activates all of the major muscle groups in your body, signaling to your brain and neural connections “Hey, get this body ready for action”.
